column4: if i do a windows install after an ubuntu install, both on separate harddrives, will windows bootloader still overwrite grub?
no, which windows version are you installing?
it may add an entry for ubuntu to the windows 7 bootloader
im installing windows AFTER ubuntu on a SEPARATE hard drive though
i wouldn't worry about grub being wiped
are you one of the ops here?
but you've had experience with this?
just joined channel out of interest, not looking for help, saw your question, done 100's of installs, gave you my opinion
can I get your email so I can ask you a question if it goes wrong
ok, i havent used irc for a LONG time idk how to pm
